3 weeks ago - Lush Limited is a British cosmetics retailer which is headquartered in Poole, England. It was founded in 1995 by trichologist Mark Constantine, his wife Mo Constantine and five other founders. It produces and sells creams, soaps, shampoos, shower gels, lotions, moisturisers, scrubs, masks, ...

All of our gifts are lovingly designed, packed and wrapped, giving you unique and fragrant ways to help you celebrate any occasion. We think giving the perfect gift is one of the most beautiful ways you can honor someone’s special day – and we can help you with that!
